original_text: And it was broken in that day: and so the poor of the flock that waited upon me knew that it was the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 당일에 곧 폐하매 내 말을 지키던 가련한 양들은 이것이 여호와의 말씀이었던 줄 안지라

sentences.original_text: And it was broken in that day
and so the poor of the flock
knew that it was the word of the Lord
